No browser or extension data is shared with the app developer. Rest assured, all user data is exclusively stored within the user's own device, ensuring absolute privacy and eliminating any possibility of data leaks or unauthorized access. KanbanTab is not responsible for loss of any data, under any circumstances.

Don't hesitate to reach out to KanbanTab via email at info@kanbantab.com for any questions, bug reports, or anything else!
